snippet: Jie Zhang will become superintendent of the New York Military Academy in Cornwall-on-Hudson, N.Y., which expects to enroll many Chinese students.
abstract: New York Military Academy in Cornwall-on-Hudson, NY, announces that it has hired Jie Zhang as superintendent; Zhang is current principal of Stuyvesant High School in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Jie Zhang will become superintendent of the New York Military Academy in Cornwall-on-Hudson, N.Y., which expects to enroll many Chinese students.

headline.main: Stuyvesant Principal to Lead Struggling Military School
headline.print_headline: Military School  Picks Principal  of Stuyvesant  as New Leader
